briefdescription.para: Name of the requested GUI control.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of GUI control names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getGUIControlCount.
View over the GUI control name string.

briefdescription.para: Name of the requested raw control.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of raw control names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getRawControlCount.
View over the control name string.

briefdescription.para: Name of the requested joint.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of joint names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getJointCount.
View over the joint name string.

briefdescription.para: Number of joint index lists.

simplesect.para: This value is useful only in the context of DefinitionWriter.

briefdescription.para: List of joint indices for the specified LOD.

parameterdescription.para: The level of detail which joints are being requested.

simplesect.para: The lod index must be less than the value returned by getLODCount.
View over the joint indices.

briefdescription.para: Index of the requested joint's parent.

detaileddescription.para:
The joint hierarchy may be traversed and reconstructed using this function. Example: Joint names: [A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I] Hierarchy: [0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 4, 2, 6, 2] Describes the following hierarchy: A
B | + D | + E | + F
C
G | + H
I
Requesting the parent index of joint 5 (joint name: F) would return 4 (joint name: E). Requesting the parent index of the root joint: 0 (joint name: A) would return the same index 0. An out of bounds request (an index greater than the number of joints returns UINT16_MAX).
index
The joint index which parent is being requested.

briefdescription.para: Name of the requested blend shape channel.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape channel names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by BlendShapeChannelExtentReader::getBlendShapeChannelCount.
View over the blend shape channel name string.

briefdescription.para: Number of blend shape channel index lists.

simplesect.para: This value is useful only in the context of DefinitionWriter.

briefdescription.para: List of blend shape channel indices for the specified LOD.

parameterdescription.para: The level of detail which blend shape channels are being requested.

simplesect.para: The lod index must be less than the value returned by getLODCount.
View over the blend shape channel indices.
These LOD indices are not interchangeable with the LOD values from BehaviorReader::getBlendShapeChannelLODs.

briefdescription.para: Name of the requested animated map.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of animated map names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getAnimatedMapCount.
View over the animated map name string.

briefdescription.para: Number of animated map index lists.

simplesect.para: This value is useful only in the context of DefinitionWriter.

briefdescription.para: List of animated map indices for the specified LOD.

parameterdescription.para: The level of detail which animated maps are being requested.

simplesect.para: The lod index must be less than the value returned by getLODCount.
View over the animated map indices.

briefdescription.para: Name of the requested mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of mesh names.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getMeshCount.
View over the mesh name string.

briefdescription.para: Number of mesh index lists.

simplesect.para: This value is useful only in the context of DefinitionWriter.

briefdescription.para: List of mesh indices for the specified LOD.

parameterdescription.para: The level of detail which meshes are being requested.

simplesect.para: The lod index must be less than the value returned by getLODCount.
View over the mesh indices.

briefdescription.para: Number of mesh-blend shape channel mapping items.

parameterdescription.para: A mapping's position in the zero-indexed array of mesh-blend shape channel mappings.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getMeshBlendShapeChannelMappingCount.
A structure holding the mesh index and the associated blend shape channel index.

briefdescription.para: List of mesh-blend shape channel mapping indices for the specified LOD.

simplesect.para: The indices from this list can be used with the getMeshBlendShapeChannelMapping API to retrieve individual mapping items.

parameterdescription.para: The level of detail which meshes are being requested.

simplesect.para: The lod index must be less than the value returned by getLODCount.
View over the mesh blend shape channel mapping indices.

parameterdescription.para: A joint's position in the zero-indexed array of joint translations.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getJointCount.
The joint's translation (x, y, z).

briefdescription.para: List of all translation X values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointTranslation.
View over all X values.

briefdescription.para: List of all translation Y values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointTranslation.
View over all Y values.

briefdescription.para: List of all translation Z values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointTranslation.
View over all Z values.

parameterdescription.para: A joint's position in the zero-indexed array of joint rotations.

simplesect.para: The index must be less than the value returned by getJointCount.
The joint's rotation (x, y, z).

briefdescription.para: List of all rotation X values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointRotation.
View over all X values.

briefdescription.para: List of all rotation Y values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointRotation.
View over all Y values.

briefdescription.para: List of all rotation Z values.

simplesect.para: This is an advanced API for performance critical access, for more convenient usage see getNeutralJointRotation.
View over all Z values.

briefdescription.para: Read-only accessors for DNA attributes that represent the rig's static data.

simplesect.para: Implementors should inherit from Reader itself and not this class.
